content: lucy is a classic simple to knit hat with a relaxed slouchy fit it s worked seamlessly from the bottom-up on double pointed needles then topped with a pompom pattern includes schematic with measurements of finished hat designed to fit 18 46cm dolls with a head circumference of approx 12 1/4 31cm such as american girl australian girl gotz maplelea girl and similar dolls in addition according to the craft yarn council s standard head sizes page 1 preemie babies have the same head size as an american girl doll so you could use this and other ag doll patterns for that purpose the difficulty level of this pattern is easy - requires a knowledge of or willingness to learn basic knitting skills increasing decreasing and working in the round on dpns what you will need in order to knit this pattern yarn ………………………… 1 ball of rowan wool cotton 50% merino wool 50% cotton 123 yds/113 m per 50g ball dk weight samples shown in colors 911 rich & 951 tender if substituting yarn you ll need only approx 75 yds/69 m needles …………………… set of 4 or 5 dpns in us size 4 3 50mm for body of hat and us size 3 3 25mm for ribbed edging *adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge * notions ……………………… tapestry needle for yarn ends 1 st marker 1 http //www craftyarncouncil com/headsize html
